value.title: Understand concepts of data analytics
value.excerpt: Explore key concepts of data analytics, including types of analytics, data, and storage. Explore the analytics process and tools used to discover insights.

value.title: Use tools to optimize Power BI performance
value.excerpt: Use tools to develop, manage, and optimize Power BI data model and DAX query performance.

value.title: DAX Table Functions: ALL, FILTER, & VALUES
value.excerpt: Learn how to incorporate DAX Table functions in Power BI with real world scenarios. Also learn how to quickly add these functions in to dynamic calculations in DAX.

value.title: Decision Tree Classifier - Machine Learning in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to build a machine learning decision tree classifier in Power BI with some simple code. In the tutorial you will learn how to modify and visualize the model output so that you get the best results  This will be achieved with simple Python code. value.title: Dynamic Outlier Detection and Visualization with DAX in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn the theory and best methods to create a dynamic sensitive outlier detectionand customize it to your particular dataset.

value.title: Import Google Trends in Python and Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to get Google Trends data in Python and Power with just a few lines of code.  You quickly get tons of keywords and date ranges with a few simple lines of Python. This code can easily transferred to Power BI so that this data can easily be uploaded  You can find the code here: Chapters.  0:40

value.title: Power BI Course for Beginners (Part 1-Getting to Know Power BI)
value.excerpt: If you are looking for a job and need to learn Power BI this is the perfect course for you. In this course you will learn Power BI using Facebook marketing data. You can get the data set for the course here: https://github.com/Gaelim/Power-BI-Courses/blob/master/fb_campaign.csv

value.title: Automatic custom backgrounds for Power BI Desktop
value.excerpt: How can you with no effort besides the original set up, create stunning reports every single time? In this tutorial, i will show you how to set up a custom background for every new page automatically, so you reports wont look dull and white and will stand out among the crowds. value.title: Bulk import data from multiple pages on a website with Power BI Desktop - Power BI Tips & Tricks #04
